description:
A lightweight Android app that indexes Termux tools from GitHub metadata.

Android application that indexes Termux tools using metadata.

Termux Hub is a lightweight, metadata-driven Android app that catalogs Termux-related tools using a transparent and reproducible data pipeline.

How it works

  • Fetches static metadata from GitHub
  • Processes tools, star counts, and READMEs independently
  • Stores validated data in a local Room database
  • Uses the local database as the source of truth after sync
  • Falls back to cached or bundled data if syncing fails
  • Stars and tool READMEs update daily at 00:00 UTC

Data sources

All data is read-only and sourced exclusively from:

https://github.com/maazm7d/TermuxHub

Consumed resources include:

  • Tool metadata index
  • GitHub star counts
  • Tool README files
  • Tool thumbnails
  • Hall of Fame index and entries

No other external sources are accessed.

Contributing

To add or index your own tool, see:
CONTRIBUTING.md
